name: Transcripts in a Flash
tag_list: transcription, transcripts, entertainment, professional, services, communication, internet, podcasts
overview:
Transcripts in a Flash transcribes various types of audio/video multimedia material. This includes interviews, seminars, focus groups, meetings, brainstorming sessions, consultations, or completed video footage such as shows, documentaries, and more.

From company website: Our “Flash-ionistas” love transcribing, and we strive to treat your files with care and provide the best transcript possible. We will use our skills with rapid typing , grammar, English, spelling, researching unknown words or phrases and accurately reflecting the spoken word to provide you with a near-perfect transcript.

Specializes in a wide variety of industries. One of their major selling points is having certified court reporters and stenographers on staff as a rich resource (which means typing speeds and turnaround times are at least 2 times faster) without having to pay the typical additional legal fees associated with legal transcription professionals.
